QuestData.Title: Second in Command
QuestData.Description: Wait... I remember something else.$B$BSir Edward... he was shouting... looking for someone.$B$BI... I can't remember who. There were so many screams...
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Sir Edward at Admiral Taylor's Garrison.
QuestData.RewardText: If today was any other day I'd have you court-martialed for being out of uniform.
